Description:
Adversaries may look for details about the network configuration and settings of systems they access or through information discovery of remote systems

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - SharpView Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where original_file_name = 'SharpView.exe' and process_path like '%\SharpView.exe' and (command like '%Add-RemoteConnection%' or command like '%Convert-ADName%' or command like '%ConvertFrom-SID%' or command like '%ConvertFrom-UACValue%' or command like '%Convert-SidToName%' or command like '%Export-PowerViewCSV%' or command like '%Find-DomainObjectPropertyOutlier%' or command like '%Find-DomainProcess%' or command like '%Find-DomainShare%' or command like '%Find-DomainUserEvent%' or command like '%Find-DomainUserLocation%' or command like '%Find-ForeignGroup%' or command like '%Find-ForeignUser%' or command like '%Find-GPOComputerAdmin%' or command like '%Find-GPOLocation%' or command like '%Find-Interesting%' or command like '%Find-LocalAdminAccess%' or command like '%Find-ManagedSecurityGroups%' or command like '%Get-CachedRDPConnection%' or command like '%Get-DFSshare%' or command like '%Get-DomainComputer%' or command like '%Get-DomainController%' or command like '%Get-DomainDFSShare%' or command like '%Get-DomainDNSRecord%' or command like '%Get-DomainFileServer%' or command like '%Get-DomainForeign%' or command like '%Get-DomainGPO%' or command like '%Get-DomainGroup%' or command like '%Get-DomainGUIDMap%' or command like '%Get-DomainManagedSecurityGroup%' or command like '%Get-DomainObject%' or command like '%Get-DomainOU%' or command like '%Get-DomainPolicy%' or command like '%Get-DomainSID%' or command like '%Get-DomainSite%' or command like '%Get-DomainSPNTicket%' or command like '%Get-DomainSubnet%' or command like '%Get-DomainTrust%' or command like '%Get-DomainUserEvent%' or command like '%Get-ForestDomain%' or command like '%Get-ForestGlobalCatalog%' or command like '%Get-ForestTrust%' or command like '%Get-GptTmpl%' or command like '%Get-GroupsXML%' or command like '%Get-LastLoggedOn%' or command like '%Get-LoggedOnLocal%' or command like '%Get-NetComputer%' or command like '%Get-NetDomain%' or command like '%Get-NetFileServer%' or command like '%Get-NetForest%' or command like '%Get-NetGPO%' or command like '%Get-NetGroupMember%' or command like '%Get-NetLocalGroup%' or command like '%Get-NetLoggedon%' or command like '%Get-NetOU%' or command like '%Get-NetProcess%' or command like '%Get-NetRDPSession%' or command like '%Get-NetSession%' or command like '%Get-NetShare%' or command like '%Get-NetSite%' or command like '%Get-NetSubnet%' or command like '%Get-NetUser%' or command like '%Get-PathAcl%' or command like '%Get-PrincipalContext%' or command like '%Get-RegistryMountedDrive%' or command like '%Get-RegLoggedOn%' or command like '%Get-WMIRegCachedRDPConnection%' or command like '%Get-WMIRegLastLoggedOn%' or command like '%Get-WMIRegMountedDrive%' or command like '%Get-WMIRegProxy%' or command like '%Invoke-ACLScanner%' or command like '%Invoke-CheckLocalAdminAccess%' or command like '%Invoke-Kerberoast%' or command like '%Invoke-MapDomainTrust%' or command like '%Invoke-RevertToSelf%' or command like '%Invoke-Sharefinder%' or command like '%Invoke-UserImpersonation%' or command like '%Remove-DomainObjectAcl%' or command like '%Remove-RemoteConnection%' or command like '%Request-SPNTicket%' or command like '%Set-DomainObject%' or command like '%Test-AdminAccess%')
